name: In Shadow
description:
In Shadow is a tiny little game I made to test out an engine I developed using SDL back in college. You control a little ball dude named Persei that must navigate the shadows of objects, which are created by the second ball dude, the Luminar.

The game is short and missing a lot, but I wrote all of it in a terrifying anxiety-induced fever, so I'm not terribly eager to wade back into its dark, maddening depths anytime soon. I haven't found it to be terribly bug-ridden, but if you find any, enjoy the crunch.

WASD to move, LShift to switch between the characters. Get Persei to the door.
